message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) as it deals with the detection of sarcasm in tweets using a topic model. Additionally, it could also belong to the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) as the model used in the paper is a hierarchical topic model. The paper also involves sentiment analysis, which could place it in the sub-category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper involves text analysis, which could place it in the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
